returns._result: The value in 18 decimals format of the next price feed
returns._validity: Whether the next price feed is valid or not

read().details: Will revert if is the price feed is invalid

returns._ok: Whether the oracle should be updated or not

updateResult().details: Will revert if the delay since last update has not elapsed

returns._success: Whether the update was successful or not

getNextResultWithValidity().notice: The next valid price feed, taking effect at the next updateResult call

getResultWithValidity().notice: Fetch the latest oracle result and whether it is valid or not

lastUpdateTime().notice: The timestamp of the last update

priceSource().notice: Address of the non-delayed price source

shouldUpdate().notice: Indicates if a delay has passed since the last update

symbol().notice: Symbol of the quote: token / baseToken (e.g. 'ETH / USD')

updateDelay().notice: The delay in seconds that should elapse between updates

updateResult().notice: Updates the current price with the last next price, and reads the next price feed

documentation.text: @dev View function that queries the standard price source
@dev View function that returns whether the delay between calls has been passed
